summary: **Monsters, Inc.** is a 2001 Pixar movie about two monster friends, Sulley and Mike, who scare kids to make energy. When a little girl named Boo enters their world, they must return her home. The film was directed by Pete Docter and features John Goodman and Billy Crystal. It was a big hit, making over $528 million and winning an Oscar for Best Original Song. A prequel, **Monsters University**, and a TV series, **Monsters at Work**, were later released.
title: Monsters, Inc.
